A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SWJs and Disney are ruining Star Wars. They don't seem to realize that the direction of their characters takes away from the plot\, and makes them less relatable to the audience. All this \"past must die\" rhetoric that they talk about in the new films is exactly what they are doing to the stories of Star Wars...killing it\, tearing down the legacy and building a big crappy SJW statue on the remains.
